current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To make permanent the extended period of protections for members of uniformed services relating to
			 mortgages, mortgage foreclosure, and eviction, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Foreclosure Relief and Extension for Servicemembers Act of 2014
